amendment.description: To set aside funds for the development of a map depicting pyrrhotite occurrences through the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3468 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3468 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5499) To set aside funds for the development of a map depicting pyrrhotite occurrences through the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3468 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3468 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
